unnormalised: **Gas Cylinder Prices Pinching Pockets Again? Diwali Blues Incoming!**
normalised: **Gas Cylinder Prices Pinching Pockets Again? Diwali Blues Incoming!**

unnormalised: Hey folks, guess what? That gas cylinder price just did another one of those "surprise!" jumps. Yup, looks like cooking up that delicious biryani for the weekend just got a tad more expensive.
normalised: Hey folks, guess what? That gas cylinder price just did another one of those "surprise!" jumps. Yup, looks like cooking up that delicious biryani for the weekend just got a tad more expensive.

unnormalised: Sources say a standard 14.2 kg cylinder will now cost Rs. 50 more, effective immediately. That's gonna sting, especially with Diwali just around the corner and all those sweets to be made!
normalised: Sources say a standard fourteen point two kilogram cylinder will now cost rupees fifty more, effective immediately. That's gonna sting, especially with Diwali just around the corner and all those sweets to be made!

unnormalised: Industry experts at IIM Bangalore are blaming it on global crude oil fluctuations, but honestly, does that make the hole in our wallets any smaller?
normalised: Industry experts at I I M Bangalore are blaming it on global crude oil fluctuations, but honestly, does that make the hole in our wallets any smaller?

unnormalised: Rumours are swirling that Bharat Petroleum and Indian Oil Corporation are feeling the pressure too.
normalised: Rumours are swirling that Bharat Petroleum and Indian Oil Corporation are feeling the pressure too.

unnormalised: Meanwhile, maa is already calculating how much less gulab jamun she can make this year. Sigh.
normalised: Meanwhile, maa is already calculating how much less gulab jamun she can make this year. Sigh.

unnormalised: People in Chennai are saying this hike is worse than last year's Onam rush for appam ingredients! What's a family to do?
normalised: People in Chennai are saying this hike is worse than last year's Onam rush for appam ingredients! What's a family to do?

unnormalised: Maybe time to invest in that solar cooker after all. Or learn to cook everything in one pot, like they do in hostels, eh?
normalised: Maybe time to invest in that solar cooker after all. Or learn to cook everything in one pot, like they do in hostels, eh?
